name: Just Dance Now 2019 Old Gen Style
description:
It's a first version of this style. Wait for updates!
Subscribe on my channel on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCesSO9MlGGl7edemIwis9Pw?view_as=subscriber
Credits go to Doctor Rey and the Neolish Team since I did use some of their assets.
additional_info:
v. 1.2
Changed dance card

discussions.name: Appears as if you copy and pasted my own credits sentence, but it's a good skin!
